data.wordByWord: ذِكْرُ [(A) mention] رَحْمَتِ [(of the) Mercy] رَبِّكَ [(of) your Lord] عَبْدَهُۥ [(to) His servant] زَكَرِيَّآ [Zakariya]
إِذْ [When] نَادَىٰ [he called] رَبَّهُۥ [(to) his Lord] نِدَآءً [a call ] خَفِيًّۭا [secret]

data.textUthmani: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّى وَهَنَ ٱلْعَظْمُ مِنِّى وَٱشْتَعَلَ ٱلرَّأْسُ شَيْبًا وَلَمْ أَكُنۢ بِدُعَآئِكَ رَبِّ شَقِيًّا
data.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] رَبِّ [My Lord] إِنِّى [Indeed, [I]] وَهَنَ [(have) weakened] ٱلْعَظْمُ [my bones] مِنِّى [my bones] وَٱشْتَعَلَ [and flared] ٱلرَّأْسُ [(my) head] شَيْبًۭا [(with) white] وَلَمْ [and not] أَكُنۢ [I have been] بِدُعَآئِكَ [in (my) supplication (to) You] رَبِّ [my Lord] شَقِيًّۭا [unblessed]
data.transliteration: Qala rabbi innee wahana alAAathmuminnee washtaAAala arra/su shayban walam akunbiduAAa-ika rabbi shaqiyya

data.textUthmani: وَإِنِّى خِفْتُ ٱلْمَوَٰلِىَ مِن وَرَآءِى وَكَانَتِ ٱمْرَأَتِى عَاقِرًا فَهَبْ لِى مِن لَّدُنكَ وَلِيًّا
data.wordByWord: وَإِنِّى [And indeed, I] خِفْتُ [[I] fear] ٱلْمَوَٰلِىَ [the successors] مِن [after me] وَرَآءِى [after me] وَكَانَتِ [and is] ٱمْرَأَتِى [my wife] عَاقِرًۭا [barren] فَهَبْ [So give] لِى [[to] me] مِن [from] لَّدُنكَ [Yourself] وَلِيًّۭا [an heir]
data.transliteration: Wa-innee khiftu almawaliya min wara-eewakanati imraatee AAaqiran fahab lee min ladunkawaliyya

data.textUthmani: يَرِثُنِى وَيَرِثُ مِنْ ءَالِ يَعْقُوبَ ۖ وَٱجْعَلْهُ رَبِّ رَضِيًّا
data.wordByWord: يَرِثُنِى [Who will inherit me] وَيَرِثُ [and inherit] مِنْ [from] ءَالِ [(the) family] يَعْقُوبَ ۖ [(of) Yaqub] وَٱجْعَلْهُ [And make him] رَبِّ [my Lord] رَضِيًّۭا [pleasing]
data.transliteration: Yarithunee wayarithu min ali yaAAqoobawajAAalhu rabbi radiyya

data.textUthmani: يَـٰزَكَرِيَّآ إِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلَـٰمٍ ٱسْمُهُۥ يَحْيَىٰ لَمْ نَجْعَل لَّهُۥ مِن قَبْلُ سَمِيًّا
data.wordByWord: يَـٰزَكَرِيَّآ [O Zakariya] إِنَّا [Indeed, We] نُبَشِّرُكَ [[We] give you glad tidings] بِغُلَـٰمٍ [of a boy] ٱسْمُهُۥ [his name] يَحْيَىٰ [(will be) Yahya] لَمْ [not] نَجْعَل [We (have) assigned] لَّهُۥ [[for] it] مِن [before] قَبْلُ [before] سَمِيًّۭا [(this) name]
data.transliteration: Ya zakariyya innanubashshiruka bighulamin ismuhu yahya lamnajAAal lahu min qablu samiyya

data.textUthmani: قَالَ رَبِّ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لِى غُلَـٰمٌ وَكَانَتِ ٱمْرَأَتِى عَاقِرًا وَقَدْ بَلَغْتُ مِنَ ٱلْكِبَرِ عِتِيًّا
data.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] رَبِّ [My Lord] أَنَّىٰ [How] يَكُونُ [can] لِى [I have] غُلَـٰمٌۭ [a boy] وَكَانَتِ [while is] ٱمْرَأَتِى [my wife] عَاقِرًۭا [barren] وَقَدْ [and indeed] بَلَغْتُ [I have reached] مِنَ [of] ٱلْكِبَرِ [the old age] عِتِيًّۭا [extreme]
data.transliteration: Qala rabbi anna yakoonu leeghulamun wakanati imraatee AAaqiran waqadbalaghtu mina alkibari AAitiyya

data.textUthmani: قَالَ كَذَٰلِكَ قَالَ رَبُّكَ هُوَ عَلَىَّ هَيِّنٌ وَقَدْ خَلَقْتُكَ مِن قَبْلُ وَلَمْ تَكُ شَيْـًٔا
data.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] كَذَٰلِكَ [Thus] قَالَ [said] رَبُّكَ [your Lord] هُوَ ['It] عَلَىَّ [(is) easy for Me] هَيِّنٌۭ [(is) easy for Me] وَقَدْ [and certainly] خَلَقْتُكَ [I (have) created you] مِن [before] قَبْلُ [before] وَلَمْ [while not] تَكُ [you were] شَيْـًۭٔا [anything.']
data.transliteration: Qala kathalika qalarabbuka huwa AAalayya hayyinun waqad khalaqtuka min qablu walamtaku shay-a

data.textUthmani: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱجْعَل لِّىٓ ءَايَةً ۚ قَالَ ءَايَتُكَ أَلَّا تُكَلِّمَ ٱلنَّاسَ ثَلَـٰثَ لَيَالٍ سَوِيًّا
data.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] رَبِّ [My Lord] ٱجْعَل [Make] لِّىٓ [for me] ءَايَةًۭ ۚ [a sign] قَالَ [He said] ءَايَتُكَ [Your sign] أَلَّا [(is) that not] تُكَلِّمَ [you will speak] ٱلنَّاسَ [(to) the people] ثَلَـٰثَ [(for) three] لَيَالٍۢ [nights] سَوِيًّۭا [sound]
data.transliteration: Qala rabbi ijAAal lee ayatan qalaayatuka alla tukallima annasa thalathalayalin sawiyya

data.textUthmani: فَخَرَجَ عَلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦ مِنَ ٱلْمِحْرَابِ فَأَوْحَىٰٓ إِلَيْهِمْ أَن سَبِّحُوا۟ بُكْرَةً وَعَشِيًّا
data.wordByWord: فَخَرَجَ [Then he came out] عَلَىٰ [to] قَوْمِهِۦ [his people] مِنَ [from] ٱلْمِحْرَابِ [the prayer chamber] فَأَوْحَىٰٓ [and he signaled] إِلَيْهِمْ [to them] أَن [to] سَبِّحُوا۟ [glorify (Allah)] بُكْرَةًۭ [(in) the morning] وَعَشِيًّۭا [and (in) the evening]
data.transliteration: Fakharaja AAala qawmihi mina almihrabifaawha ilayhim an sabbihoo bukratan waAAashiyya
